verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. Aljocab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová masanto t'a schaanhil satcha’anh.
Alec wach' lolonel t'ay masanil ex yángel. Alec wach' lolonel masanil ex soldadoal satcha’anh.
Ik'chajocab' chaanh Jehová yuj k'u yet' q'uen uj. Ik'chajocab' chaanh yuj q'uen nitk'anal te wach' yilji yoc.
Ik'chajocab' chaanh yuj satcha’anh, to chaanh ay yet' pax yuj ha ha' ayek' t'a yib'anh satcha’anh chi'.
Alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová, yujto tonhej ix yala' ix b'ocan smasanil.
A' ix b'oancan masanil juntzanh chi' t'a yet'tal yic wach' ayek' ta' t'a masanil tiempo, ix yak'ancanoch t'a sleyal to malaj b'ak'uinh ol q'uexchajoc.
Yalocab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová masanil tastac ay t'a sat lu'um tik, nok' nivac nok' ay t'a yol ha' mar yet' pax nok' ay t'a sjulal yich ha',
yet' leb'lon, q'uen sacb'at, q'uen sacb'acom, k'ik'al asun yet' chacxuxum ik', k'anab'ajumocab' syutej sb'ha t'a slolonel Jehová chi'.
Yalocab' wach' lolonel lum nivac vitz t'a Jehová, lum tzalquixtac, te te' syak' sat, te' k'ute',
yet' nok' k'ultaquil nok', nok' molb'etzal nok', nok' snhervi, ma sjachvi yet' pax nok' much.
Ex sreyal yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ex anima t'a junjun chonhab', ex yajal yet' ex tze b'o yaj eb' chonhab',
ex vinac, ex ix, ex ichamtac anima yet' pax ex unin, alec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová e masanil.
Alec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová e masanil yujto anhej te b'inajnac. Ha stziquiquial ay masanto t'a yib'anh satcha’anh yet' t'a yib'anh lum lum tik.
A' ix ak'an quipal a onh schonhab' onh tik. Calec wach' lolonel t'ay a onh israel onh tik, a onhton te xajanab'il onh yuj. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
